tool_description: Zestful  is the simplest way to parse recipe ingredients into beautiful JSON.
name: Recipe and Ingredient Analysis
title: Recipe and Ingredient Analysis

api_list.name: Parse Ingredients
api_list.description: Parse recipe ingredients into structured data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zestful.p.rapidapi.com/parseIngredients"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zestful.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zestful.p.rapidapi.com/parseIngredients"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zestful.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
